tail.name: tail
tail.transformationDescription:
#IF(npc.getTailCount()==1) A scaly, tail sprouts from just above [npc.her] ass, rapidly growing in size until it's about [npc.tailLength] long. But something feels strange suddenly [npc.she] [npc.verb(let)] out an involuntary moan, [npc.name] [npc.verb(feel)] [npc.her] tail further shifting and engorging into a new form, and [npc.sheIs] hit by a wave of overwhelming arousal as the veins of [npc.her] tail bulge outward. [npc.her] tail develops further as glands start to take shape on the tip of the tail, [npc.she] no long just have a tail but a throbbing tail cock, ready to penetrate the wall of any orifice it comes across. As [npc.she] [npc.verb(pant)] and [npc.verb(gasp)] for air, the tip of [npc.her] tail cock spurts out a monumental amount of cum.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] a [style.boldDog(cock snapper tail)], [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.tailFullDescription(true)] which can release snapper cum. #ELSE [npc.TailCount] scaly, tails sprouts from just above [npc.her] ass, rapidly growing in size until it's about [npc.tailLength] long. But something feels strange suddenly [npc.she] [npc.verb(let)] out an involuntary moan, [npc.name] [npc.verb(feel)] [npc.her] tail further shifting and engorging into a new form, and [npc.sheIs] hit by a wave of overwhelming arousal as the veins of [npc.her] tail bulge outward. [npc.her] tail develops further as glands start to take shape on the tip of the tail, [npc.she] no long just have a tail but a throbbing tail cock, ready to penetrate the wall of any orifice it comes across. As [npc.she] [npc.verb(pant)] and [npc.verb(gasp)] for air, the tip of [npc.her] tail cock spurts out a monumental amount of cum.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [npc.tailCount] [style.boldDog(cock snapper tail)], [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.tailFullDescription(true)] which can release snapper cum. #ENDIF
tail.bodyDescription: Growing out from just above [npc.her] ass, [npc.sheHasFull] #IF(npc.getTailCount()==1) a #IF(npc.isTailFeral()) [style.colourFeral(feral)],#ENDIF [npc.tailColour(true)] cock snapper tail, which [npc.she] can swish from side to side at will. #ELSE [npc.tailCount] #IF(npc.isTailFeral()) [style.colourFeral(feral)],#ENDIF [npc.tailColour(true)] cock snapper tails, which [npc.she] can swish from side to side at will. #ENDIF
